Uses of Class
java.nio.channels.FileChannel

  • Packages that use FileChannel 
    Package Description
    java.io
    Provides for system input and output through data streams, serialization and the file system.
    java.nio.channels
    Defines channels, which represent connections to entities that are capable of performing I/O operations, such as files and sockets; defines selectors, for multiplexed, non-blocking I/O operations.
    java.nio.file.spi
    Service-provider classes for the java.nio.file package.

    • Uses of FileChannel in java.io

      Methods in java.io that return FileChannel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FileChannel RandomAccessFile.getChannel()
      Returns the unique FileChannel object associated with this file.
      FileChannel FileOutputStream.getChannel()
      Returns the unique FileChannel object associated with this file output stream.
      FileChannel FileInputStream.getChannel()
      Returns the unique FileChannel object associated with this file input stream.

    • Uses of FileChannel in java.nio.channels

      Methods in java.nio.channels that return FileChannel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FileChannel FileLock.channel()
      Returns the file channel upon whose file this lock was acquired.
      static FileChannel FileChannel.open(Path path, OpenOption... options)
      Opens or creates a file, returning a file channel to access the file.
      static FileChannel FileChannel.open(Path path, Set<? extends OpenOption> options, FileAttribute<?>... attrs)
      Opens or creates a file, returning a file channel to access the file.
      abstract FileChannel FileChannel.position(long newPosition)
      Sets this channel's file position.
      abstract FileChannel FileChannel.truncate(long size)
      Truncates this channel's file to the given size.
      Constructors in java.nio.channels with parameters of type FileChannel 
      Constructor and Description
      FileLock(FileChannel channel, long position, long size, boolean shared)
      Initializes a new instance of this class.

    • Uses of FileChannel in java.nio.file.spi

      Methods in java.nio.file.spi that return FileChannel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FileChannel FileSystemProvider.newFileChannel(Path path, Set<? extends OpenOption> options, FileAttribute<?>... attrs)
      Opens or creates a file for reading and/or writing, returning a file channel to access the file.
